detail: I want to understand what it is that I need to understand a topic deeper / see the relationship between each components.
title: Software Engineer

detail: I'm hoping to learn software engineering practices and mindsets that would help me get started and stay on track for developing good habits. I'd also love to learn more about what different teams are working on. Lastly, I'd like to have the chance to learn about shaping my career goals and getting to them!
title: Software Engineer

detail: I am interested to know more contributing to Upstream projects at Microsoft. I am looking to be part of the CNCF groups and exploring new  Kubernetes projects.  Additionally, I will benefit from soft skills such as  stakeholder alignment, better communication and public speaking.
title: PM

detail: I'm hoping to get a better understanding of the options I have ahead of me and potential directions I can take my career from where it is now. I also wish to learn more about how to better manage my time, and balance learning on the job with being a productive engineer/contributor to my team. I also look forward to meeting new people and making new connections!
title: PM

detail: This is how I achieved what I have today, by having great mentors. So Just trying to give that back. Helping people is my hobby. I'm learning while helping others. I am doing that with the broader k8s community and would love to do it for my colleagues.
title: Senior Software Engineer

detail: Being an internal transfer from another organization into AKS, I'd like to take the mentorship opportunity to learn more about how AKS works as an organization and what it takes to be successful here. I'm also looking for technical guidance and how to effectively learn what's expected of me technically.
title: Software Engineer

detail: Would definitely love to have a mentor that I can consult to and ask questions not in my direct work groups to avoid sensitivity issue. Great to know that our org has a mentorship program.
title: Senior Software Engineer

detail: Not really sure how to answer this one :) I am happy to share my experience in all the areas above :) as well as to learn what people are interested to explore
title: Principal PM

detail: Learn more about monitoring solutions or Testing. Also need guidance on how promotions work in Microsoft and help me get a better idea on how to succeed in that process
title: Software Engineer

detail: Since I just started on the Upstream Publishing team a month ago, I would like to learn more about how all the parts of Upstream/AKS fit together. I would also like to talk about growth within the company, what kinds of experiences and resources people have found useful in terms of learning and working here, and any advice that can be given to a person just starting their career.
title: Software Engineer

detail: I would like to learn more about designing good software and thinking deeper about techincal problems. I would also like to better my ability to judge the impact of work. I also want to take some ownership and work my way toward being a leader in my sig. Also organization of work temporally, would be great. I struggle to organize all of my commitments since I have been taking on work in both observability and remediation as well as autoscale. I am joining the autoscaling sig so learning more about the interworkings of node bootstrapping and the like would be good. I want to learn a deep foundation of everything that AKS does to the node, so I can better cater my development efforts.  And would like some mentorship in how to organize my time to better tackle azure specific concepts
title: Software Engineer

detail: I enjoy helping early career folks to navigate the growth ladder.
title: Senior Software Engineer

detail: Happy to mentor anyone that would like to learn more about writing performant Kusto queries.

detail: Mentoring for: 1. dev -> mgr role change 2. achieving and sustaining work life balance 3. how to navigate early career
